title: Sir I'm not able to hear my pixel sounds clearly.
content:
Good Morning Sir/Ma'am,
I'm not able to hear any clear sounds on my phone like not able to hear the person on the other side of the call clearly...then I'm also not able to hear media sounds  as I earlier used to...they are a very soft as compared to the earlier loud ones.... I'm not able to hear the phone ringtone. Please help me it's causing a lot of issues.
